2.caption_en:
Slide explaining holistic portfolio management for large corporations, describing how firms like Amazon, Bosch, and BASF manage multiple sub-ecosystems to allocate resources, identify synergies, and mitigate risk; accompanied by a right-side infographic mapping Amazon's ecosystem.

  "artifact_type": "presentation_slide",
  "title": "Holistic Portfolio Management for Corporates and large enterprises",
  "language": "English",
  "layout": "two-column landscape slide: left and center contain explanatory text, right contains an infographic/diagram",
  "summary": "Describes a holistic portfolio management approach enabling large corporations to oversee multiple sub-ecosystems, identify synergies and gaps, allocate resources strategically, and assess risk to drive sustainable growth; includes an Amazon ecosystem diagram as an example.",
  "key_points": [
    "Holistic approach needed to manage diverse sub-ecosystems across large corporate portfolios",
    "Systematic analysis of sub-ecosystems to identify synergies, overlaps, and gaps",

    "Framework for assessing risk and ensuring resilience",

3.caption_en:

4.caption_en:
This slide explains a holistic portfolio management approach for large corporations, describing how firms should analyze and manage multiple sub-ecosystems to identify synergies, allocate resources strategically, and mitigate risks to drive resilient, sustainable growth. An Amazon ecosystem diagram on the right visually illustrates interconnected sub-ecosystems and brand/product nodes.

{
  "type": "slide",
  "title": "Holistic Portfolio Management for Corporates and large enterprises",
  "language": "English",
  "summary": "Describes a holistic portfolio management approach for large corporations to analyze and manage multiple sub-ecosystems, identify synergies and gaps, allocate resources strategically, and improve resilience and sustainable growth; includes an Amazon ecosystem diagram as an illustrative example.",
  "key_points": [
    "Holistic view of sub-ecosystems enables coordination, resource allocation, and strategic alignment.",
    "Systematic analysis of sub-ecosystems helps identify synergies, overlaps, and gaps for better decision-making.",
    "Leveraging economies of scale and shared resources facilitates cross-fertilization of ideas and capabilities.",
    "Provides a framework for assessing risk and ensuring resilience across the corporate ecosystem.",
    "Resource allocation should be based on strategic importance and growth potential of each sub-ecosystem."
  ],
  "visual_elements": [
    {
      "type": "diagram",
      "subject": "Amazon ecosystem map",
      "position": "right",
      "description": "Bubble/ node diagram centered on amazon.com showing connected sub-ecosystems (B2C, B2B/B2G, cloud, logistics, financial services, digital ads, books, entertainment, smart home, gaming) with brand/product nodes and highlighted Amazon account availability."
    }
  ],
  "text_density": "high",
  "layout": {
    "orientation": "landscape",
    "headline_position": "top-left",
    "body_columns": 2,
    "diagram_column": "right"
  },
  "source": "Book \"The Ecosystem Economy\", 2022",
  "visual_style": {
    "headline_color": "dark blue",
    "body_text_color": "black/grey",
    "background": "light grey/white",
    "accent_color": "orange"
  },
  "notes": "Slide intended for corporate strategy presentations to illustrate managing diverse business portfolios through a holistic approach."
}
